questions.question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
options: a) Strengths: creative, analytical, detail-oriented; Weaknesses: impatient, perfectionist
b) Strengths: outgoing, good at public speaking, able to build relationships; Weaknesses: shy, disorganized
c) Strengths: good with numbers, able to think logically, able to handle stress; Weaknesses: not creative, not good at public speaking
d) Strengths: entrepreneurial spirit, able to take risks, able to work independently; Weaknesses: not detail-oriented, not good at following instructions
e) Strengths: athletic, coordinated, able to perform in front of an audience; Weaknesses: not good with numbers, not good at public speaking

questions.question: What kind of work environment do you prefer?
options: a) Collaborative environment where I can work with others
b) Independent environment where I can work on my own
c) Creative environment where I can express myself
d) Fast-paced environment where I can be challenged
e) Structured environment where I have clear instructions

questions.question: Do you like to work independently or as part of a team?
options: b) As part of a team

questions.question: Do you prefer to work indoors or outdoors?
Are you comfortable with public speaking?
Are you detail-oriented or do you see the big picture?
How do you handle stress and pressure?
options: a) I handle stress and pressure well.
b) I do not handle stress and pressure well.
